text: The fourteenth series of the British academy drama series Waterloo Road was shown on BBC One and BBC iPlayer, It was shown from 10 September 2024 to 29 October 2024. It is the first series to be set at the old Manchester College campus in Manchester, Greater Manchester, England. == The series == The show follows the lives of the teachers and the pupils at Waterloo Road. It has stories such as the school changing into an academy, trolling, the cost-of- living crisis, gender politics, bullying, being a child in care, bereavement, menstruation, County lines drug trafficking, the arts vs academic performance, being deaf, and manslaughter. == Cast and characters == === Main cast === * Jason Manford as Steve Savage;
